Verses: 1 ivaigalukkuppinbu Yesu Thiperiyaa Kadarkaraiyile Marupadiyum Seesharukkuth Thammai Velippaduththinaar; Velippaduththina Vivaramaavadhu:
2 seemon Pedhuruvum, Thidhimu Ennappatta Thomaavum, Galileyaa Naattilulla Kaanaa Ooraanaagiya Naaththaanvelum, Sebedheyuvin Kumaararum, Avarudaiya Seesharil Veru Iranduperum Koodiyirukkumbodhu,

3 seemon Pedhuru Matravargalai Nokki: Meenpidikkappogiren Endraan. Adharku Avargal: Naangalum Ummudanekooda Varugirom Endraargal. Avargal Purappattuppoi, Udane Padaverinaargal. Andha Raaththiriyile Avargal Ondrum Pidikkavillai.
4 vidiyarkaalamaanapodhu, Yesu Karaiyile Nindraar; Avarai Yesu Endru Seeshargal Ariyaadhirundhaargal.
5 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Pillaigale, Pusikkiradharku Edhaagilum Ungalidaththil Undaa Endraar. Adharku Avargal: Ondrumillai Endraargal.

6 appozhudhu Avar: Neengal Padavukku Valadhupuramaaga Valaiyaip Podungal, Appozhudhu Ungalukku Agappadum Endraar. Appadiye Avargal Pottu, Thiralaana Meengal Agappattadhinaal, Adhai Izhukkamaattaadhirundhaargal.

7 aadhalaal Yesuvukku Anbaayirundha Seeshan Pedhuruvaip Paarththu: Avar Karththar Endraan. Avar Karththarendru Seemonpedhuru Kettavudane, Thaan Vasthiramillaadhavanaayirundhapadiyinaal, Than Mersattaiyaik Kattikkondu Kadalile Gudhiththaan.
8 matra Seeshargal Karaikku Erakkuraiya Irunoorumuzhath Thooraththilirundhapadiyinaal Padavilirundhukonde Meengalulla Valaiyai Izhuththukkonduvandhaargal.
9 avargal Karaiyile Vandhiranginapodhu, Karineruppup Pottirukkiradhaiyum, Adhinmel Meen Vaiththirukkiradhaiyum, Appaththaiyum Kandaargal.
10 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Ippozhudhu Pidiththa Meengalil Silavatraik Konduvaarungal Endraar.
11 seemonpedhuru Padavil Eri Nootraimbaththumoondru Periya Meengalaal Niraindha Valaiyaik Karaiyil Izhuththaan; Iththanai Meengal Irundhum Valai Kizhiyavillai.
12 yesu Avargalai Nokki Vaarungal, Bojanampannungal Endraar. Avaraik Karththarendru Seeshargal Arindhapadiyinaal Avargalil Oruvanum: Neer Yaar Endru Ketkath Thuniyavillai.
13 appozhudhu, Yesu Vandhu, Appaththaiyum Meenaiyum Eduththu, Avargalukkuk Koduththaar.
14 yesu Mariththorilirundhezhundhapinbu Thammudaiya Seesharukku Arulina Dharisanangalil Idhu Moondraavadhu Dharisanam.

15 avargal Bojanampannina Pinbu, Yesu Seemon Pedhuruvai Nokki: Yonaavin Kumaaranaagiya Seemone, Ivargalilum Adhigamaai Nee Ennidaththil Anbaayirukkiraayaa Endraar. Adharku Avan: Aam Aandavare, Ummai Nesikkiren Enbadhai Neer Ariveer Endraan. Avar: En Aattukkuttigalai Meyppaayaaga Endraar.

16 irandaandharam Avar Avanai Nokki: Yonaavin Kumaaranaagiya Seemone, Nee Ennidaththil Anbaayirukkiraayaa Endraar. Adharku Avan: Aam Aandavare, Ummai Nesikkiren Enbadhai Neer Ariveer Endraan. Avar:en Aadugalai Meyppaayaaga Endraar.

17 moondraandharam Avar Avanai Nokki: Yonaavin Kumaaranaagiya Seemone, Nee Ennai Nesikkiraayaa Endraar. Ennai Nesikkiraayaa Endru Avar Moondraandharam Thannaik Kettapadiyinaale, Pedhuru Dhukkappattu: Aandavare, Neer Ellaavatraiyum Arindhirukkireer, Naan Ummai Nesikkiren Enbadhaiyum Neer Ariveer Endraan. Yesu: En Aadugalai Meyppaayaaga Endraar.

18 nee Ilavayadhullavanaayirundhapodhu Unnai Neeye Araik Kattikkondu, Unakku Ishtamaana Idangalile Nadandhu Thirindhaai; Nee Mudhir Vayadhullavanaagumbodhu Un Kaigalai Neettuvaai; Veroruvan Un Araiyaik Katti, Unakku Ishtamillaadha Idaththukku Unnaik Kondupovaan Endru Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Unakku Sollugiren Endraar.
19 innavidhamaana Maranaththinaale Avan Dhevanai Magimaippaduththappogiraanenbadhaik Kurikkumpadiyaaga Ippadi Sonnaar. Avar Idhai Solliyapinbu, Avanai Nokki: Ennaip Pinpatrivaa Endraar.

20 pedhuru Thirumbippaarththu, Yesuvukku Anbaayirundhavanum, Raappojanam Pannugaiyil Avar Maarbile Saaindhu: Aandavare, Ummaik Kaattikkodukkiravan Yaar Endru Kettavanumaagiya Seeshan Pinne Varugiradhaik Kandaan.
21 avanaik Kandu, Pedhuru Yesuvai Nokki: Aandavare, Ivan Kaariyam Enna Endraan.
22 adharku Yesu: Naan Varumalavum Ivanirukka Enakku Siththamaanaal, Unakkenna, Nee Ennaip Pinpatrivaa Endraar.

23 aagaiyaal Andha Seeshan Marippadhillai Engira Pechchu Sagodhararukkulle Parampitru. Aanaalum, Avan Marippadhillaiyendru Yesu Sollaamal, Naan Varumalavum Ivanirukka Enakku Siththamaanaal Unakkennavendru Sonnaar.
24 andha Seeshane Ivaigalaik Kuriththu Saatchikoduththu Ivaigalai Ezhudhinavan; Avanudaiya Saatchi Meyyendru Arindhirukkirom.
25 yesu Seydha Veru Anega Kaariyangalumundu; Avaigalai Ovvondraaga Ezhudhinaal Ezhudhappadum Pusthagangal Ulagam Kollaadhendru Ennugiren. Aamen.
